function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differential access to green areas leading to avoidance of parks in poorer neighborhoods during the pandemic.","Impact":"Increased risk of crowding in other public spaces, leading to higher transmission of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Provide incentives and support for residents in poorer neighborhoods to access green spaces, and implement measures to distribute crowding across all public spaces.","Technologies":"Community outreach programs, mobile applications for park availability and utilization.","People":"Residents in poorer neighborhoods, public health officials, urban planners, policymakers.","Owner":"Local government, community organizations, public health agencies."},{"Description":"Lack of citizen participation in governance of urban green spaces during the pandemic.","Impact":"Ineffective planning and management of green spaces, leading to underutilization and misallocation of resources.","Mitigation":"Engage residents in participatory planning processes, gather feedback on park preferences, and involve local communities in decision-making.","Technologies":"Online forums, mobile apps for feedback collection, virtual town hall meetings.","People":"Residents, urban planners, policymakers.","Owner":"Local government, community organizations, urban planning agencies."},{"Description":"Influence of expert-citizens on policy design without comprehensive stakeholder engagement.","Impact":"Policy decisions may not fully represent the needs and perspectives of all stakeholders, leading to inequitable outcomes and resistance to policy implementation.","Mitigation":"Ensure comprehensive stakeholder engagement, including marginalized communities, in policy design processes, and promote transparent and inclusive decision-making.","Technologies":"Online platforms for stakeholder engagement, digital surveys, community outreach tools.","People":"Expert-citizens, policymakers, marginalized communities.","Owner":"Policy design agencies, advocacy organizations, community leaders."}]}
